release_notes.en-US: Remove Kickstarter campaign pop-up, since the campaign has succeeded and is almost over.

description.en-US:
Thunderbird 78 support for this add-on is in development but not yet available. 

Adds menu items allowing the user to toggle the Replied, Forwarded, and Redirected flags on existing messages.

This add-on was created by Christian Eyrich. He is no longer maintaining it, and his version is no longer compatible with recent versions of Thunderbird and SeaMonkey, so Jonathan Kamens has taken over maintaining it. Thank you to Christian Eyrich for all his work on this add-on!

summary.en-US: Enables toggling of replied, forwarded, and redirected states of messages.
summary.de: Ermöglicht das Umschalten der Beantwortet- und Weitergeleitet-Markierung von Nachrichten.
summary.it: Permette di marcare i messaggi a cui si è risposto e inoltrati.
